itunes:title: #169 - Drawing from Your Content to Write a Book with Ezzie Spencer
title: #169 - Drawing from Your Content to Write a Book with Ezzie Spencer
description:
It seems like everyone is publishing a book these days (ourselves included!), so we invited our friend and author, Ezzie Spencer of Lunar Abundance, to talk with us about drawing from your existing content and conversations from your clients and audience to write a book.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Twenty20

Get full show notes for this episode here

---
